alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 03 at 2:14PM EST until March 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches, highest amounts near the New Hampshire border. * WHERE...Eastern Essex County. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult overnight and Saturday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow develops around midnight and changes to rain on Cape Ann Saturday morning. The snow may be heavy at times overnight. Another period of moderate to heavy snow is possible late Saturday morning into the afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
